items.summary: Add <meta name="mobile-web-app-capable" content="yes"> to frontend/index.html alongside or replacing the deprecated <meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-capable" content="yes"> tag to resolve the browser deprecation warning.

Fix the PWA manifest icon entry in frontend/public/manifest.json so that the icon referenced (IMG_4505.ico or equivalent) uses a valid image file with correct dimensions and format. Replace the .ico reference with a properly sized PNG icon (e.g., 192x192 and 512x512) so the browser can load the manifest icon without a 'Resource size is not correct' error.
